overview: Two talented singers of the times stand side by side to provide you with incredible LIVE hits!  Drawing fans to their exceptional new "2004 Concert" like a magnet, the talented artists bombarded their fans with good-sounding tunes once more! Now you can view all the musical magic in full detail as their fantastic DVD super treat offers you such unforgettable smashs like "In a Hurry", "Cannot Sing", "Warm Winter Â– Mild Summer", "Won't Ever Change" & "Playing with Fire" among many other great treats that promise to turn your home into a LIVE concert hall!  Learn more about this product in the official site of Alan & Hacken 2004 Concert
title: Alan Tam & Hacken Lee 2004 Live
